channel.title: Ajax - FC Groningen
channel.description:
Well, yesterday there used to be some soccer match here, Ajax - FC Groningen. Hooligans from FC Groningen started to throw toilet paper and fire on the field, and ruined the whole match. My mate mark was there also and took some pics, lucky bitch added the pics on a website and the news paid him money to use it loll.
[img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto1.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto2.JPG[/img] Fire [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto3.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto4.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto5.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto19.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto6.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto7.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto8.JPG[/img] They still decided to continue the match, and the hell came. [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto9.JPG[/img] Supporters decided to get on the field and go to the Ajax supporters. [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto17.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto18.JPG[/img] Just when they're close to the Ajax supporters the security came lolz. [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto11.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto12.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto13.JPG[/img] [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto21.JPG[/img]
Some of the results: [img]http://markfcg.gethost.nl/fcgbrand/Foto23.JPG[/img]
Shit hooligans, Now we finally have a new stadion, and they decide to fuck it up.

item.title: Ajax - FC Groningen
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

goatee:

Waste of toilet paper…

The directors of the stadion gave them permission to get toilet paper with them, that’s usually like that.
Now rumours say the hooligans had a few phone calls with the fire department, which gave them permission to use fire even.
They said they’ll be there when the supporters come in, but nope, they came 40 minutes after it has all happened lolll.

Also this was a little problem I heard on the radio:

(No not a joke)

Read full topic

Well, yesterday there used to be some soccer match here, Ajax - FC Groningen.
Hooligans from FC Groningen started to throw toilet paper and fire on the field, and ruined the whole match.
My mate mark was there also and took some pics, lucky bitch added the pics on a website and the news paid him money to use it loll.



Fire







They still decided to continue the match, and the hell came.

Supporters decided to get on the field and go to the Ajax supporters.


Just when they’re close to the Ajax supporters the security came lolz.
